options.label: map
options.fig.cap: A map of northern coastal Tanzania showing the bathymetry of Pemba and Zanzibar Channel. A solid black line represents isobar of 200 meters contour line. Insets are cross sections across the Pemba and Zanzibar Channel. Solid black line with arrow represent the western branch and the main East African Coastal Current

options.label: wind
options.fig.cap: Wind Speed and direction in the Pemba Channel during a) the northeast (NE) and b) southeast (SE) monsoon seasons

options.label: ctd-expeds
options.fig.cap: A map of the coastal and marine water of Tanzania displaying the geographical positions of CTD casts deployed with the RV Algoa (2004) and RV Agulhas II (2017 and 2018) expeditions
